fields.summary: After Syncing Large Number of LDAP Users, Timeout Occurs When Attempting to Delete Account

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Unable to stop large LDAP/AD syncs when resetting authentication.ldap_integration_configuration

comments.body:
Following seen in the logs (cloud-output.log):

{code}
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Removing obsolete users: [], in account mainstream-user4642
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Updating group mainstream-user 4642 in account mainstream-user4642
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Updating account elevator-user-2099
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Removing obsolete users: [], in account elevator-user-2099
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Adding new account babylon-user26200
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000000667 AuthenticationProperties | LDAP integration configuration changed to { 'sync': { 'enable':'false' } }
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000000667 LdapSync                 | A new LIC is being set: ---Parsed LIC---
                          | ldap-service:
                          |     server-url:null
                          |     auth-method:null
                          |     user-auth-method:null
                          |     auth-principal:null
                          |     auth-credentials:null
                          |     use-ssl:false
                          |     ignore-ssl-cert-validation:false
                          |     krb5-conf:null
                          | sync:
                          |     enable:false
                          |     auto:false
                          |     interval:0
                          |     clean-deletion:false
                          | groups-partition:
                          |     {}
                          | groups:
                          |     base-dn:null
                          |     id-attribute:null
                          |     member-attribute:null
                          |     selection:filter='null';select='[]';not-select='[]'
                          | users:
                          |     base-dn:null
                          |     id-attribute:null
                          |     sasl-id-attribute:null
                          |     user-info-attributes:{}
                          |     selection:filter='null';select='[]';not-select='[]'
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000000667 Timers                   | com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceOperations$1@6ee424d6: completed in 80 msec.
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Adding new group babylon-user 26200
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Updating account mainstream-user4641
2013-08-30 13:53:25 DEBUG 000230099 LdapSync                 | Removing obsolete users: [], in account mainstream-user4641
{code}
This may need to be part of rewriting LDAP to be an integration instead of a sync
